reviewText:
This reminded me of Qbert,  except this one is way better.
I love the crisp images and the level structure..   I started playing it, and before i knew it, i was 2 hours into the game already...   You just want that 1 extra star... It's  addicting...  Can't leave this game alone.
If you like Qbert, then this is a MUST game to play..
Go get it NOW!!!

reviewText: This is exactly what I was looking for in a fun, casual puzzler.  It's familiar enough at the start but the puzzle difficulty ramps up pretty quick.  I like the fact that there are a few ways to complete the levels without getting a perfect" score because it gives me enough reason to go and replay the levels I've already finished."

reviewText: Quadle is a very cool game that plays a lot like Qbert. Lots of fun to be had here.

reviewText:
I really like this game and the added level editor is a real plus.
Reminds me of playing the old arcade games like Q-Bert (but with it's own unique game play of course)

Game play is simple but challenging and being able to create your own levels for others to play adds even more fun to this nice title. Nice graphics and style, I find it easier to play with the music turned off (seems less distracting for some reason).

I can foresee this game as the new retro" game that our kids will reminisce about :)"
